#summary Tools used to pack/unpack, or anything helps.

== File extract/import ==

=== Trucha ===

This tool can extract the ISO file recursively. But only files smaller than original can be imported.

Usage:
 * import .key file to Windows registry
 * select "custom key pair 1" in menu
 * remember to "Trucha sign" partition after modification


=== WiiScrubber ===

This tool can import files of any size into ISO.

Usage:
 * put common-key.bin to correct place
